CustomField.formula: IF (OR(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Signatures"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Filing"), AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Authoring"),ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Source__c,"Other Party Paper"))), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__AgreementActivate?id=" &Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_Activate", "Activate"),"_self"),NULL)
CustomField.label: Activate
